thumb.title: 日本の歴史秘話 寺子屋は二つの家に 千住氷川神社
thumb.description: 千住氷川神社 東京都足立区千住四丁目31番2号 出典 千住の寺子屋 群雀堂遺聞 清水唐風, 斎田作楽Drawing of Sugawara no Michizane.Kikuchi Yosaihttps://ja.m.wikisource.org/wiki/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%AB:Sugawara_Michizane.jpgA school group portrait.about 1864.Charles Parker.The Getty Museumhttps://www.getty.edu/art/collection/object/109BZNBAKUMATSU BOYS -- Brother Teaches Brother to Write, While Little Sister Looks On in Old Japan.https://flic.kr/p/4B1twqBIG SISTERS STUDY HARD WHILE LITTLE BROTHER LOOKS ON in OLD JAPANhttps://flic.kr/p/7u84ckBOYS IN SKIRTS -- Going to School in Old Japanhttps://flic.kr/p/4D8teySchoolboy in Costume with Knapsack.Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/naa.photolot.97/ref7236?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1848&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1848Library of Congress,Three little maids from school--dainty geisha girls before.2020637499 BGM All_the_Love byのる ナレーションは音読さん
